extension.name: FiveM RCON
extension.description: Restart resources and send commands to your FiveM server
command.configure.title: FiveM: Configure Connection
command.connect.title: FiveM: Connect to Server
command.disconnect.title: FiveM: Disconnect
command.sendCommand.title: FiveM: Send Command
command.testUdp.title: FiveM: Test UDP Connectivity
command.restartResource.title: FiveM: Restart Resource
connect.warning.noConfig: Please configure RCON connection first using "RCON: Configure Connection"
connect.error: Error connecting to RCON. Check the log for details.
sendCommand.warning.notConnected: Must connect to RCON server first
restartResource.warning.noConnection: No active RCON connection. Would you like to connect now?
restartResource.prompt.resourceName: Enter the name of the resource to restart
testUdp.timeoutNote: This is NOT necessarily an error - some servers don't respond to invalid messages
